    • Method Detail

      • getFactor

        public double getFactor(double value,
                        double maximum,
                        double minimum,
                        int sign)
        Returns the factor of the argument value within the range of the segment.

        If sign == 0, then the factor must be:

        • 1 if value == (maximum-minimum)/2
        • 0 if value <= minimum
        • 0 if value >= maximum
        If sign == 1, then the factor must be:
        • 0 if value <= minimum
        • 1 if value >= maximum
        If sign == -1, then the factor must be:
        • 1 if value <= minimum
        • 0 if value >= maximum
        Specified by:
        getFactor in interface Function
        Parameters:
        value - The value to compute.
        maximum - The maximum value.
        minimum - The minimum value.
        sign - The sign, -1, 0 or 1.
        Returns:
        The factor.
